file-read.code:
LFILE=file_to_read
TF=$(mktemp -d)
touch $TF/empty.yara
clamscan --no-summary -d $TF -f $LFILE 2>&1 | sed -nE 's/^(.*): No such file or directory$/\1/p'

suid.code:
LFILE=file_to_read
TF=$(mktemp -d)
touch $TF/empty.yara
./clamscan --no-summary -d $TF -f $LFILE 2>&1 | sed -nE 's/^(.*): No such file or directory$/\1/p'

sudo.code:
LFILE=file_to_read
TF=$(mktemp -d)
touch $TF/empty.yara
sudo clamscan --no-summary -d $TF -f $LFILE 2>&1 | sed -nE 's/^(.*): No such file or directory$/\1/p'
